start.text: You stand surrounded on all sides by water. What do you do?

die_north.text: You are eaten by sharks and die.

live_east.text: You manage to tread water and survive. What do you do?

die_east.text: You eaten by piranhas and die.

die_west.text: Dolphins attempt to fornicate with you, you do not survive their attempts.

die_north2.text: A manatee wanted to use you as a pillow, you are crushed beneath their massive size.
